alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 07 at 8:36PM CDT until July 08 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT SATURDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTY... At 836 PM CDT, Trained weather spotters reported 5.05 inches of rain have fallen at the Pat Jones YMCA on East Republic Road. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Springfield, Battlefield, Galloway and Turners. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
